function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High prevalence of anxiety, depression, and PTSD in the population.","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health issues and reduced well-being in the population.","Mitigation":"Implementation of mental health support programs, access to counseling services, and public awareness campaigns on mental health.","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, mental health apps, and online counseling services.","People":"General public, particularly those with low income, previous health problems, and young age.","Owner":"Government health agencies, mental health organizations, and community support groups."},{"Description":"Association of anxiety, depression, and PTSD with COVID-19 knowledge, economic losses, and concern about infection.","Impact":"Increased mental health symptoms due to pandemic-related factors.","Mitigation":"Providing accurate and accessible information about COVID-19, financial support for those experiencing economic losses, and mental health interventions targeting infection-related stress.","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, financial assistance programs, and virtual mental health support.","People":"Individuals affected by COVID-19, people experiencing economic hardships, and those with heightened concern about infection.","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, and employer organizations."},{"Description":"Correlation of anxiety, depression, and PTSD with demographic factors such as gender, age, marital status, and education level.","Impact":"Vulnerability of specific demographic groups to mental health challenges.","Mitigation":"Tailored mental health interventions for at-risk demographic groups, targeted mental health education, and community support initiatives.","Technologies":"Data analytics for demographic risk profiling, online mental health education modules, and community outreach platforms.","People":"Demographic groups with higher susceptibility to mental health issues, including young individuals, women, and those with lower income or education level.","Owner":"Community healthcare providers, educational institutions, and local government authorities."}]}
